project_abstract.cdata: The project would provide: (a) Equipment for and extension of buildings to: (i) 18 technical and 14 agricultural high schools; (ii) 10 higher schools/junior colleges for industrial, agricultural, fishery and nursing training; (iii) colleges of agriculture, engineering and natural sciences, in 9 universities and a merchant marine college; and (iv) 10 junior teacher colleges and 12 colleges of education. (b) Specialist services and fellowships for: (i) a pre-investment study on health education; (ii) a pre-investment study on management education; and (iii) staff development.
